column4: for some reason I keep getting an error window popping up that says "Can't eject volume".
for some reason I keep getting an error window popping up that says "Can't eject volume".   Is there anyway I can keep it from doing this?
is it an external drive that you are trying to eject?

No.  I am not trying to eject anything.  And I don't have any external drives.  It just had a hundred of these error windows opened when I got up this morning (I let my comp run all the time.  Everyone in my house has information on it that they access via the network).
nope i only get that error message sometimes when unmounting drives the GUI way lol, so instead i do sudo umount /media/drivename
